name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY2】 [XJJXk28ivwY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening introduction sequence for 'hololive 3rd Generation Live'. Each member is showcased with their name and catchphrase.
The members perform their opening song and greet the live audience.

subtitles.original: こんぺこ！
subtitles.english: Konpeko!

subtitles.original: こんぬいー！
subtitles.english: Kon-nui!

subtitles.original: Ahoy!
subtitles.english: Ahoy!

subtitles.original: 超アイドル宣言ガールは　欲張り
subtitles.english: Super Idol Declaration Girls are greedy

subtitles.original: 笑い合って　もっと可愛くなる
subtitles.english: Laughing together, we'll become even cuter

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah Yeah

subtitles.original: 遠いようで　近くて
subtitles.english: Seems far, yet so close

subtitles.original: 他人なのに　家族みたいで
subtitles.english: Even though we're strangers, we're like a family

subtitles.original: レボリューション？
subtitles.english: Revolution?

subtitles.original: 狂うなハイセッション
subtitles.english: Don't go crazy, high session

subtitles.original: 喜怒哀楽を分かち合ってさ
subtitles.english: Sharing our joys and sorrows

subtitles.original: デカくなって行きたいよね
subtitles.english: We want to keep growing bigger

subtitles.original: でも小さな事も大事にして
subtitles.english: But let's also cherish the small things

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ　刻んで
subtitles.english: Carving it out, step by step

subtitles.original: 楽しんでくれるのが　嬉しい
subtitles.english: Seeing you enjoy yourself makes us happy

subtitles.original: 僕らのエンターテイナー
subtitles.english: Our entertainer

subtitles.original: 後ろまで見えてる
subtitles.english: We can see all the way to the back

subtitles.original: 画面の向こうも届いてる
subtitles.english: Reaching out to those behind the screens too

subtitles.original: 光の海を泳ぐのさ
subtitles.english: Swimming through a sea of lights

subtitles.original: 超アイドル宣言ガールは　欲張り
subtitles.english: Super Idol Declaration Girls are greedy

subtitles.original: 愛されたい　認められたい　君とじゃなきゃ　嫌だ
subtitles.english: Wanting to be loved, wanting to be recognized, it has to be with you

subtitles.original: 絶好調です　狙い撃ちで　君にウインク
subtitles.english: We're in top form, aiming a wink right at you

subtitles.original: やっぱ宣言ガールで　めっちゃハッピー
subtitles.english: As expected, being Declaration Girls makes us so happy

subtitles.original: あれもしたい　これもしたい
subtitles.english: Wanting to do this, wanting to do that

subtitles.original: 叶えちゃう　ヤッタ！
subtitles.english: We'll make it happen, yay!

subtitles.original: 全力走る　もちろん君と
subtitles.english: Running with all our might, of course with you

subtitles.original: 笑い合って　もっと可愛くなる
subtitles.english: Laughing together, we'll become even cuter

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah Yeah

subtitles.original: せっかくだから　やりきりたい！
subtitles.english: Since we're here, we want to give it our all!

subtitles.original: 乗り越えるべき壁もデカい
subtitles.english: The walls we must overcome are also huge

subtitles.original: トライ＆エンタメで
subtitles.english: With try and entertainment

subtitles.original: 君が思ってるよりずっと
subtitles.english: Much more than you might think

subtitles.original: 君のこと想ってる
subtitles.english: We're thinking of you

subtitles.original: どうかな？　焦がれた
subtitles.english: How is it? The dream we yearned for

subtitles.original: 夢には近づけてるかな？
subtitles.english: Are we getting any closer to it?

subtitles.original: これがあるから頑張れるんだ
subtitles.english: This is why we can keep working hard

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let us hear you

subtitles.original: もう最高宣言ガールは　幸せ
subtitles.english: Now, the Best Declaration Girls are happy

subtitles.original: 愛されていて　伸び代あって　下向くとか　ヤダ
subtitles.english: Being loved, having room to grow, we hate looking down

subtitles.original: テンポアップし　続けて行く　未来景色
subtitles.english: Speeding up, continuing on to the future scenery

subtitles.original: 世界に届けて
subtitles.english: Reaching out to the world

subtitles.original: 限界突破で
subtitles.english: Breaking through our limits

subtitles.original: 今すぐ達成
subtitles.english: Achieving it right now

subtitles.original: みんなで作ってく
subtitles.english: Building it together with everyone

subtitles.original: イェイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: DAY2も盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Day 2 is gonna be even more hyped!

subtitles.original: 君たちまだまだ声出せますよねー！
subtitles.english: You guys can still shout even more, right?!
